QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: EntranceAltitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Vehicle will fly to/from the structure at this altitude.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ScanBottomAlt
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Altitude for the bottomost covered area of the scan. You can adjust this value such that the Bottom Layer Alt will fly above obstacles on the ground.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: StartFromTop
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Start scanning from top of structure.
